dudit_1.Description: How often do you use drugs other than alcohol?

Levels.1: Once a month or less often

dudit_2.Description: Do you use more than one type of drug on the same occasion?

Levels.1: Once a month or less often

dudit_3.Description: How many times do you take drugs on a typical day when you use drugs?

dudit_4.Description: How often are you influenced heavily by drugs?

Levels.1: Less often than once a month

dudit_5.Description: Over the past year, have you felt that your longing for drugs was so strong that you could not resist it?

Levels.1: Less often than once a month

dudit_6.Description: Has it happened, over the past year, that you have not been able to stop taking drugs once you started?

Levels.1: Less often than once a month

dudit_7.Description: How often over the past year have you taken drugs and then neglected to do something you should have done?

Levels.1: Less often than once a month

dudit_8.Description: How often over the past year have you needed to take a drug the morning after heavy drug use the day before?

Levels.1: Less often than once a month

dudit_9.Description: How often over the past year have you had guilt feelings or a bad conscience because you used drugs?

Levels.1: Less often than once a month

dudit_10.Description: Have you or anyone else been hurt (mentally or physically) because you used drugs?

Levels.2: Yes, but not over the last year

dudit_11.Description: Has a relative or a friend, a doctor or a nurse, or anyone else, been worried about your drug use or said to you that you should stop using drugs?

Levels.2: Yes, but not over the last year
